title: Who Killed Dorothy - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Mature   Mystery   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Character Growth   Cute Protagonist   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Survival Game   Virtual Reality
author: 장단조
description:
The game takes place in the cruel fairy tale of 'The Land of Oz'.
Dorothy, the main character, has gone missing due to a serious error, 'The Prince'

[This is the Wonderful Wizard of Oz! Nice to meet you, Dorothy!]

The stuffed NPC Asha, expecting Dorothy not to come, descends from the scarecrow pole and becomes the new protagonist in this confusing game.
Asha, who lives half a day as a human and half as a scarecrow, seeks Dorothy to escape from the clutches of villains who are trying to kill her.
Will Asha be able to return Dorothy to the role of the main character and return to the peaceful life of an NPC?>
